action.content: Plan a 12-day trip to Italy for professionals in finance, including Rome, Florence, and Venice. Make it in a format of a list with at least one placeholder, such as [address]. The response must be in English and all lowercase letters.
action.label: context

action.content:
day 1: arrive in rome, check into [hotel name], explore the colosseum and forum  
day 2: visit the vatican city, tour the sistine chapel and st. peter's basilica  
day 3: guided tour of the pantheon and piazza navona, free afternoon  
day 4: travel to florence, check into [hotel name], visit the duomo and david at the accademia  
day 5: explore the uffizi gallery, stroll across the ponte vecchio  
day 6: day trip to siena, visit the piazza del campo and duomo  
day 7: travel to venice, check into [hotel name], gondola ride along the grand canal  
day 8: visit st. mark's basilica and doge's palace, free time for shopping  
day 9: explore the rialto market and bridge, afternoon visit to murano island  
day 10: day trip to verona, see juliet's balcony and arena  
day 11: free day in venice for personal exploration or relaxation  
day 12: depart from venice, reflect on the trip's insights and experiences<|end_of_text|>
action.label: response
